title: Research Associate/Laboratory Manager
loc: Pringle Lab, Dept of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology, Harvard University
description_1: Responsible for setting up and maintaining the facility, training new users, establishing all protocols, and conducting research in molecular evolution, systematics, and population genetics
description_2: Developed molecular markers for AFLP, ISSR, and DNA sequence data analyses of fungi and their plant hosts
description_3: Developed methods for the molecular analysis of soil biota, including fungal-plant interactions, and DNA extraction from historical collections of fungus
